description:
Peak game
Remember to actually edit this later

v1.0.0.description:
Logic now uses a power system for most levels

Also first github release
v1.0.0.title: v1.0.0

v1.1.0.description:
fixed conveyor belts
hopefully reduced crashes when ringlink is turned on
fixed mismatched fusion challenge ids
fixed chomper maw not sending checks
reworded some options in the template yaml
v1.1.0.title: v1.1.0

v1.2.0.description:
added minigames as an option for locations
conveyor belt fusions now require all plants needed to fuse it
fixed ringlink crashing maybe
updated to 2.8
various logic improvements
v1.2.0.title: v1.2.0

v1.3.1.description:
updated to 3.0.1
5 minigames added to minigamesanity
no adventure extra yaml option
unique plants blacklist
added simple logic option
short minigames yaml option
fixed levels sending the wrong locations when minigamesanity is turned on
fixed dr zomboss' revenge not appearing when the goal option is turned on
fixed fusion challenge jicamagic not working
fixed the 'all x-9s' goal not working without adventure extra levels being turned on
v1.3.1.title: V1.3.1

v1.4.0.description:
bonus sun reworked to have more visual feedback
3 new filler items
- zen garden plant
- diamond
- star meteor

3 traps
- rough economy
- 10x game speed
- the fog is coming
v1.4.0.title: v1.4.0

v1.4.1.description:
fixed ringlink compatibility for SA1 and SA2
added some debug info to the console (whenever a level does not send a check, screenshot the console and send it to me)
added conveyor belt logic
fixed various minigame locations not being sent
fixed completing an adventure x-9 level sending you to the next world/level out of logic
v1.4.1.title: v1.4.1

v1.5.0.description:
added odyssey adventure as both levels and a goal option
added the manifest thing for 0.7.0
zombie meteor trap
deathlink actually works with losing levels now (with extra options to come)
fixed many logic issues
v1.5.0.title: v1.5.0

v1.6.0.description:
added trophy hunt as a new goal type
added survival and vasebreaker as location options
added night logic for normal difficulty
added the option to randomize mowers

updated the unique plant blacklist to support the more recent plants
fixed item/location mismatches when minigames are on
fixed odyssey adventure not being resent when closing/reopening the game
fixed various logic issues
v1.6.0.title: V1.6.0

v1.6.1.description: fixed odyssey adventure goal not generating
v1.6.1.title: V1.6.1

v1.6.2.description:
fixed vasebreaker access/bonus sun items conflicting
ringlink sun cant go negative option
chomper can now be a starting plant
filler/trap weights in the yaml
v1.6.2.title: V1.6.2
